content: not right or is a bit confusing feedback others will want to know what you think your positive feedback will help others so leave a little love and share a couple insights here are a few places you can do just that facebook like me on facebook https //www facebook com/thelittlebucketboutique ravelry http //www ravelry com/designers/elizabeth-roggasch craftsy http //www craftsy com/user/pattern/store/524520 etsy http //www etsy com/shop/littlebucketboutique returns/refunds due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final this design a written work and images are a copyright of the little bucket boutique © 2012 © copyright notice all photos are copyrighted and all rights to this pattern are owned by the little bucket boutique you do not have permission to copy share resell or forward this pattern to anyone no part of this work may be reproduced transmitted or published in any form or by any means without prior written permission from elizabeth roggasch permission is granted your finished product on a limited basis as long as credit is given to the little bucket boutique as the original designer please include a link to my etsy shop ravelry shop craftsy shop or facebook page in listing -9- elizabeth roggasch © 2012
